an4.210:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco micchādiṭṭhiko hoti … pe … micchāñāṇī hoti, micchāvimutti hoti.
an4.210:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco attanā ca micchādiṭṭhiko hoti, parañca micchādiṭṭhiyā samādapeti … pe … attanā ca micchāñāṇī hoti, parañca micchāñāṇe samādapeti;
an4.210:6.3: attanā ca micchāvimutti hoti, parañca micchāvimuttiyā samādapeti.
an4.210:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sammādiṭṭhiko hoti … pe … sammāñāṇī hoti, sammāvimutti hoti.
an4.210:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco attanā ca sammādiṭṭhiko hoti, parañca sammādiṭṭhiyā samādapeti … pe … attanā ca sammāñāṇī hoti, parañca sammāñāṇe samādapeti;
an4.210:8.3: attanā ca sammāvimutti hoti, parañca sammāvimuttiyā samādapeti.
